DD_Attribute_Full.name: mro:atmo_correction_flag
DD_Attribute_Full.definition: The MRO:ATMO_CORRECTION_FLAG element identifies whether a correction has been performed on a CRISM data product for photometric and atmospheric effects. This correction starts using I over F, and consists of division by cosine of the solar incidence angle, removal of modeled attenuation by atmospheric gases, and removal of modeled scattering and attenuation by atmospheric aerosols. ON indicates that a correction has been performed. In this case the units are Lambert albedo. OFF indicates that no correction has been performed. The units may be I_OVER_F, or LAMBERT_ALBEDO in which case I_OVER_F has been divided by cosine of the solar incidence angle but no further correction has occurred. More details can be found in the CRISM Data Products SIS.
